author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a big update of the GEM validation packages. Among others it updates old plots, removes redundant ones, introduces validation plots for GEM pad clusters and puts plugins in the correct directories. 

#### PR validation:

This PR was tested with workflow 22021.0.

Validation plots can be found here: 
- https://indico.cern.ch/event/889918/contributions/3752954/attachments/1989496/3316341/GEM_200218_Validation-SW.pdf
- https://indico.cern.ch/event/891703/contributions/3761082/attachments/1993812/3325504/200226_GEM_Validation-SW.pdf

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

@jshlee @seungjin-yang
title: GEM validation package update
